NomaiObject: solely 1 ANNONA: Bur, the sand is rising rapidly. I fear we have spent too long studying this grotto. We must return to the city before sand floods into the city; or worse, before it traps us! 2 1 ANNONA: Abandon your equipment and run! There's no time to waste! 3 2 BUR: Annona, look! Some of the equipment is rising with the sand! As I thought, there are objects other than the shuttle that float to the surface of the sand! 4 3 ANNONA: A fascinating discovery, Bur. Now, if you do not wish to learn if one can survive being compressed into the ceiling like our lifeless equipment, please, come at once! LC EX2 5
